The budget base and estimated value, will start from the unit price per kilometer applicable to the planned routes. This unit price will be 4.50 Euros base, plus 0.45 Euros of VAT at the rate of 10% and 4.95 Euros total per kilometer applicable to each bus, main and, in your case accessory/collaborator throughout the journey. As an approximate total of 9,202 kilometers is estimated to be covered by the main vehicle and additional and/or collaborators, the total and maximum amount of 41,409.00 Euros is estimated as liquidable, 4,140.90 Euros of VAT at the rate of 10% and 45,549.90 Euros in total.. input: Country: Spain. Purchaser Name: BOARD OF GOVERNORS OF VALENCIA CITY COUNCIL. Summary: Supply and Installation of "Self-Sufficient Lighting in the Perellonet District (Divided into Four Lots). Description: The purpose of this contract is to carry out the work to acquire, install and put into service the necessary equipment to ensure that the lighting and municipal public services of Perellonet are energy self-sufficient.<br> This requires, on the one hand, the transformation from the installation of obsolete lighting to a more efficient one, with better performance and lower consumption, and on the other hand, acquire and install the necessary equipment to generate sufficient energy of renewable origin, which will be of the photovoltaic solar type, accumulate it in batteries of capacity sufficient, and inject it at night to compensate for the consumption of all the lighting in the Perellonet district with self-consumption mechanisms for collective compensation.<br> The District of Perellonet is located in District 19 of the city of Valencia.<br> Lot 1 Perellonet North<br> Self-sufficient lighting in the district of Perellonet Norte<br> Lot 2 Perellonet Central<br> Self-sufficient lighting in the district of Perellonet Central<br> Lot 3 Perellonet South<br> Self-sufficient lighting in the Perellonet Sur district<br> Lot 4 Perellonet Photovoltaic<br> Self-sufficient lighting in the district of Perellonet Photovoltaic<br> Doc Title: Supply and installation of "Self-sufficient lighting in the district of Perellonet (divided into four lots)<br> Contract Type: supplies. Tender Value: 501252.82. Currency: EUR. Published Date: 2025-10-28. Closing Date: 2025-11-26. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Purchaser_Name: BOARD OF GOVERNORS OF VALENCIA CITY COUNCIL
